texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: GHANA METEOROLOGICAL AUTHORITY BILL, 2025
texts.text: GHANA METEOROLOGICAL AUTHORITY BILL, 2025

texts.label: text
texts.orig: AN ACT to provide for the establishment of a Meteorological Authority as a regulatory body to license  and  regulate  the  operations  of  meteorological  data  services  providers;  to  spearhead meteorological research and training; advice on all weather and climate issues and to ensure that all meteorological services and practices meet the international standards and for related matters.
texts.text: AN ACT to provide for the establishment of a Meteorological Authority as a regulatory body to license  and  regulate  the  operations  of  meteorological  data  services  providers;  to  spearhead meteorological research and training; advice on all weather and climate issues and to ensure that all meteorological services and practices meet the international standards and for related matters.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: PASSED by Parliament  and assented  to by the President
texts.text: PASSED by Parliament  and assented  to by the President

texts.orig: Establishment of the Authority
texts.text: Establishment of the Authority

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1. (1) There is established by this Act,  the Ghana Meteorological Authority as a body corporate.
texts.text: (1) There is established by this Act,  the Ghana Meteorological Authority as a body corporate.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (2) The Authority may for the performance of the functions of the Authority acquire
texts.text: The Authority may for the performance of the functions of the Authority acquire

texts.label: text
texts.orig: and hold property, dispose of property and enter into any contract or  related transaction .
texts.text: and hold property, dispose of property and enter into any contract or  related transaction .

texts.label: text
texts.orig: (3) Where there is an hindrance to the acquisition of land, the land  may be acquired for the Authority under the Lands Act, 2020 (Act 1036) and the cost shall be borne by the Authority.
texts.text: (3) Where there is an hindrance to the acquisition of land, the land  may be acquired for the Authority under the Lands Act, 2020 (Act 1036) and the cost shall be borne by the Authority.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Object of the Authority
texts.text: Object of the Authority

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 2. The object of the Authority is to provide meteorological services in the country and ensure the operation and maintenance of international standards and practices in meteorology in the country.
texts.text: 2. The object of the Authority is to provide meteorological services in the country and ensure the operation and maintenance of international standards and practices in meteorology in the country.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Functions of the Authority
texts.text: Functions of the Authority

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. To achieve the object under section 2, the Authority shall
texts.text: To achieve the object under section 2, the Authority shall

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (a) advise Government on meteorology generally;
texts.text: (a) advise Government on meteorology generally;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (b) issue weather forecasts for the safe operation of aircraft, ocean-going vessels, oil rigs and other socio-economic activities;
texts.text: (b) issue weather forecasts for the safe operation of aircraft, ocean-going vessels, oil rigs and other socio-economic activities;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (c) provide  meteorological  information,  advice  and  warnings  for  the  benefit  of agriculture, civil and  military aviation, surface and marine transport, operational hydrology and management of energy and water resources to mitigate the effects of  natural  disasters  such  as  floods,  storms  and  droughts  on  socio-economic development and projects;
texts.text: (c) provide  meteorological  information,  advice  and  warnings  for  the  benefit  of agriculture, civil and  military aviation, surface and marine transport, operational hydrology and management of energy and water resources to mitigate the effects of  natural  disasters  such  as  floods,  storms  and  droughts  on  socio-economic development and projects;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (d) promote  the use of meteorology  in agriculture, prevention of drought and desertification activities;
texts.text: (d) promote  the use of meteorology  in agriculture, prevention of drought and desertification activities;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (e) establish, organise and manage surface and upper air observational station networks;
texts.text: (e) establish, organise and manage surface and upper air observational station networks;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (f) collect, process, and disseminate meteorological information nationally and internationally in accordance with the rules, practices and procedures established under international conventions;
texts.text: (f) collect, process, and disseminate meteorological information nationally and internationally in accordance with the rules, practices and procedures established under international conventions;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (g) ensure  uniform  standards  of  observation  of  meteorological  phenomena  in  the country;
texts.text: (g) ensure  uniform  standards  of  observation  of  meteorological  phenomena  in  the country;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (h) train, conduct and undertake research particularly in the field of tropical, agricultural, hydrological and other aspects of meteorology;
texts.text: (h) train, conduct and undertake research particularly in the field of tropical, agricultural, hydrological and other aspects of meteorology;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (i) store  meteorological  data  and  information  for  the  purposes  of  planning  and implementation of infrastructural projects;
texts.text: (i) store  meteorological  data  and  information  for  the  purposes  of  planning  and implementation of infrastructural projects;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (j) develop and provide telecommunication systems for meteorological purposes only;
texts.text: (j) develop and provide telecommunication systems for meteorological purposes only;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (k) participate  in  local  and  international  training  and  research  in  meteorology  and climatology  and  in  other  related fields in  co-operation  with  other relevant institutions and authorities concerned with applied meteorological research;
texts.text: (k) participate  in  local  and  international  training  and  research  in  meteorology  and climatology  and  in  other  related fields in  co-operation  with  other relevant institutions and authorities concerned with applied meteorological research;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (l) collaborate with  relevant foreign and international organisations for the purposes of this Act;
texts.text: (l) collaborate with  relevant foreign and international organisations for the purposes of this Act;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (m) be the sole authority to approve the establishment of meteorological stations for meteorological observations and the approved stations share data with the Authority;
texts.text: (m) be the sole authority to approve the establishment of meteorological stations for meteorological observations and the approved stations share data with the Authority;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (n) provide consultancy services in meteorology to the public;
texts.text: (n) provide consultancy services in meteorology to the public;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (o) calibrate,  develop and fabricate meteorological equipment for internal use and export;
texts.text: (o) calibrate,  develop and fabricate meteorological equipment for internal use and export;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (p) conduct investigations into meteorological issues and advise the Minister accordingly;
texts.text: (p) conduct investigations into meteorological issues and advise the Minister accordingly;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (q) ensure due compliance with conventions, protocols and any other relevant standards and recommended practices of the World Meteorological Organisation; and
texts.text: (q) ensure due compliance with conventions, protocols and any other relevant standards and recommended practices of the World Meteorological Organisation; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (r) perform such other functions as are incidental to the objects of the Authority or as the Minister in consultation with the Board may direct.
texts.text: (r) perform such other functions as are incidental to the objects of the Authority or as the Minister in consultation with the Board may direct.
